data.name: Luxury GIRLS
data.detailed_description:
Quality never seen before.
Ultra realistic super sexy girls.
Ultra realistic skin, hair,
eyes,
genitals, breasts ...

You have a choice of three girls.

Each of them has a choice of many different outfits,
you can choose various sexy shoes, sexy lingerie, accessories such as earrings or necklaces.

After creating the girl of your dreams, you can change her positions as you like.

There are points on your arms, legs and hips for positioning,
and you can grab them by pressing the grip on the controller.

You are able to set even the weirdest sexual positions.

Features:

- ultra photorealistic girls
- three girls to choose from
- choice of sexy lingerie for girls
- setting any girl position
- sensual music
- luxurious interior

Game made only for virtual reality.

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Hungarian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (or equivalent)
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (or equivalent)
  • Storage: 3000 MB available space
